verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Till the whole world knows,
Till the whole world knows,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
I will shout and sing
of Christ my King,
Till the whole world knows.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I’ll tell to all
that God is love;
For the world
has never known

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
The great compassion
of His heart
For the wayward
and the lone.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
I’ll tell of mercy’s boundless tide,
Like the waters
of the sea,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
That covers
ev’ry sin of man;
‘Tis salvation
full and free.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
I’ll tell of grace
that keeps the soul,
Of abiding
peace within,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Of faith that overcomes the world,
With its tumult
and its din.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
Eternal darkness,
black as death,
For the children
of the night.
